text: David Rubinger (; 24 June 1924 â€“ 2 March 2017) was an Israeli photographer. His famous photo of three Israeli paratroopers after the recapture the Western Wall in the Six-Day War has become a defining image of the conflict. Shimon Peres called Rubinger "the photographer of the nation in the making". ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Austrian Jews Category:Israeli artists Category:Israeli Jews Category:Jewish artists Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:People from Vienna Category:Photographers Category:Refugees from Nazism
title: David Rubinger
